name: CarX Drift Racing Online - Japan Fest
detailed_description:
The legendary drift track is now available in CarX Drift Racing Online! Winding roads, risky track runs, ever changing elevation, complex turns & high speed coupled with outstanding atmosphere will let you open up your best skills. Conquer another top Japanese classic mountain track known for its amazing views which offers unlimited opportunities to practice high-end drifting.
DLC Japan Fest allows access to the track:
  • East Toge
